title: Enjoy The Lifestyle You Deserve In Our Unbeatable 3 BR Apt!
posting_body: ['Take a Video Tour Today', '> Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!', 'If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.', 'Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.', 'Come home to Traditions Denver, an affordable apartment community in the beautiful Highland Ranch area just outside of Denver, CO.', 'Our comfortable one, two, and three bedroom apartments are sure to impress!', 'Each unit offers in-home washer and dryer connections, open kitchens, and large living areas.', 'Living in our community you will benefit from a social room for entertaining, a 24 hour fitness center, on-site laundry facilities, and a great outdoor playground!', "We can't wait to welcome you home to Traditions Apartments!", 'We offer affordable one, two and three bedroom apartments for rent.', 'Absolutely wonderful home with washer/dryer connections and fully equipped kitchen.', 'Our community offers an on-site fitness center, playground, clubhouse, and business center.', 'Don’t miss out on living at the perfect location conveniently located next to shopping, dining and entertainment.', 'Community Amenities Include:', '- Master Walk-In Closet & Private Bath*', '- Washer & Dryer Connections', '- 1st Floor Handicap Accessible Floor Plan Layouts', '- Pet-Friendly Community', '- Professional On-Site Management Team', '- 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance Service', 'We are a pet friendly community!', 'Dogs & cats welcome!', '*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.', 'Traditions participates in an affordable housing program.', 'Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $49,260 | 2 Occupants: $56,280 | 3', 'Occupants: $63,300 | 4', 'Occupants: $70,320 | 5 Occupants: $75,960 | 6', 'Occupants: $81,600.', 'To maintain the integrity of the community;\xa0credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Make the move today by giving our professional staff a call:', 'show contact info', 'Traditions Denver', '3290 E. County Line Road', 'Highlands Ranch, CO, 80126', '<URL>', '*Some Restrictions May Apply.', 'xJFm3CUqgG2']
